name: 劉玉蓀
objective: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
schedule:
(1) Axioms of Probability (第一章) (1 week)
(2) Combinatorial Methods (第二章) (1 week)
(3) Conditional Probability and Independence (第三章) (1.5 weeks)
(4) Distribution Functions and Discrete Random Variables (第四章) (1.5 weeks)
(5) Special Discrete Distributions (第五章) (1 weeks)
(6) Continuous Random Variables (第六章) (3 weeks)
(7) Special Continuous Distributions (第七章) (1.5 weeks)
(8) Bivariate Distributions  (第八章) (2 weeks)
(9) More Expectations and Variances (第十章)
(9) Sums of Independent Random Variables and Limit Theorems   (第十一章) (2 weeks)
scorePolicy: 2次考試各佔35%，作業佔30% (大約4-6次作業)
materials:
Fundamentals of Probability, 3nd Ed. 
by Saeed Ghahramani (新月書局)
